body.name: SHOWKOO Luggage Sets Expandable ABS Hardshell 3pcs Clearance Luggage Hardside Lightweight Durable Suitcase sets Spinner Wheels Suitcase with TSA Lock (Deep Blue)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 50 mins
features: HIGHT-QUALITY 3 PIECE LUGGAGE SETS: ABS+PC hardshell material, durable and lightweight, with a full glossy features textured finish that resists compression and scratches.
TWO YEARS WARRANTY. Professional made. Size: 20in, 24in, and 28in, can be stored one into another.

EXPANDABLE & LARGE CAPACITY DESIGN: Only 24 "and 28" can expand 20% of additional packaging capacity when needed. 20" carry-on luggage can be carried on the plane. Interior mesh zip pocket and cross straps for increased packing organization.

LUGGAGE WITH TSA LOCK: Which allows only TSA agents to inspect your bags without damaging the lock, ensure your belongings arrive safely at your destination. The firm zipper locked in TSA locking pad, bring more security and feel at ease.

360° Silent Spinner Wheels provide superior maneuverability, easy and smooth movement in any direction. In addition, sturdy ergonomic 3-step telescoping handle. Top and side handle for easy carrying and transport. Enjoy your travel life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360° Double Spinner Wheels Multidirectional smooth and silent 360°wheels. ( A professional luggage quality test: Hardside luggage set can load 15kg and walks 40km at a speed of 10km/h) TPU Elastic Handle TPU elastic handles on the top and side can increase comfort when lifting the box filled with packaging, and facilitate handling. TSA Lock & Double Zipper Smooth double zipper and a built-in TSA lock act to deter theft, and ensure your belongings arrive safely at your destination. 3-step Telescoping Push-Button Handle Sturdy ergonomic 3-step telescoping handle, you can adjust it to a comfortable position. ABS+PC Hardshell Material ABS hardshell material, making the luggage sets more durable, lighter and impact-resistant.

How many sizes are there in this set of suitcases？ The size of the 3-piece luggage set is list: 20 inch,24 inch,28 inch. What are the dimensions of 20-inch, 24-inch, and 28-inch luggage? Stand the trunk on a flat ground and measure its height (including wheels) from the top of the trunk to the bottom with a tape measure: 20''：14.96in X9.05in X 22.44in 24''：17.71in X 10.62in X 25.98in 28"：19.29in X12.2in X 30.31in How much does each piece individually weigh? The weight of the suitcases can refer to below: Weight: 20inch 6.3lbs; 24inch 7.7lbs; 28inch 10.6lbs. What should I do if there is a problem with the luggage sets？ IF your suitcase has any problems, such as wheel falling, TSA lock unable to open, pull rod stuck, zipper damaged etc, please contact SHOWKOO via the Amazon email of your order, or search " SHOWKOO Direct" on FB. Does it come with a key? This is a TSA lock so it doesn’t have a key. You could always open your luggage with the correct combination and the original combination is 0-0-0.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved everything about the luggage. The quality is awesome, the price was fantastic and love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wheel broke during the second trip
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set in November and used it for 2 trips so far. On the second trip one of the wheels broke already. the luggage is very light weight and it rolls very smoothly. But I don't know if it will last very long.When I contacted the company they were happy to replace the wheel so I increased my rating. I will follow up when I get the replacement wheel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did a trip overseas with ease
reviews.reviewText: I recently took a trip overseas with my family. And though this was the first time using them, they held up really well! I like the various sizes. I like that they expand and are pretty spacious too. I fit in a ton of things in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So happy to have this luggage set for my Christmas gift! Perfect color, very durable and sturdy. Purchased the clear covering so Luugage Claim won’t ruin my luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a rolling bag and I needed it quickly. It was delivered as promised. I used the middle size one first and it took the beating from the airline. I used the smaller one on the last trip & I actually got everything I needed in it. Great but.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love them, exactly what i wanted and looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Backpacked Europe for three months with these
reviews.reviewText: I love these suitcases. Good price. I got them one year ago for a two week trip to London and they held up great. Then, a few months ago I went traveling in Europe with just the smallest of this suitcase. It rolled every four days to a new country on uneven streets and went on planes, boats, cars, you name it. I was not nice to these suitcases and rolled them across the stone sidewalks in Florence, the cobblestone streets in Prague, and literally 7 more countries and it bared with me. I had to have two people sit on it to close it with how much stuff I brought, but these suitcases are still kicking. The bottom is a bit scratched but that’s 100% my fault. Now I’m taking all three to move across the country and I have no doubts they’ll be fine. If you want a cheap, sturdy luggage set I’d definitely buy these again.

reviews.reviewerName: These arrived black and smelling rotten, scary also made in China 🤦‍♀️ Amazon was great and gave me credit
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worse luggage we’ve ever used
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If I could give this luggage a minus 💯 we would! My husband and I just took a month long trip to Europe from the US and we purchased this set especially for this long vacation….BIG mistake we had so many trains to catch, so many sidewalks, went through multiple airports and hotels and there goes everyone passing us by wheeling their luggage with ease and then there’s my husband 🤦‍♀️trying to roll the luggage, pull the luggage and the wheels were total crap he fell over the luggage multiple times because the wheels would just turn and stop!! This luggage made our month long trip to Europe so difficult and we are not young, thank goodness for all of the kind people that would happily help him. The 360 wheels are a joke, needless to say he cracked two ribs due to the wheels and him falling over them!
Very nice and true to description worth the price

reviews.reviewTitle: Super bien, se ven de calidad, y resistentes
reviews.reviewText: Esperemos superen las pruebas que les dan en los aeropuertos, que es donde se podra saber si son buenas y macizas, mi maleta anterior termino quebrada por malos manejos en un vuelo, a ver como les va a estas

reviews.reviewTitle: The luggage made it through a flight with no damage and it rolls beautifully
reviews.reviewText: After my last luggage was destroyed at the airport, I needed to have new luggage delivered to my hotel 1700 km from home. It arrived well in time and it was beautiful. Vibrant colour as described. Lightweight and sturdy. Well made zippers and inner separator flap was a nice touch. Handles worked well and all three cases had extendable handles to make my life easier. I fill my cases to max airline weight and no problems. Sturdy enough to go thru baggage handlers as this luggage came back to me after my flight in perfect condition. So pleased and relieved that I made a good choice. Plus the colour is quite snazzy.
Muy buena calidad, llegó en tiempo y en excelentes condiciones

You get a nice set for a good price. These suitcases suited all our needs for our recent trip to Greece. I liked that it came with storage bags, especially the one for shoes. The storage bags are not good quality however and one broke immediately. The handle on the large suitcase also broke just a few days into our trip which really irked me. I'd say this was a decent (not great) purchase
